content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Emilia Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for the apartment in Munich.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. I was looking for a tenant who could pay a higher price than €1000 per month, which was Emilia's maximum budget.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, the exact number would have been provided. Since we did not agree on a price, I cannot provide an exact number.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As a landlord, I'm focused on the business aspect of the negotiation and do not rate the likeability of the negotiation partner on a personal level. However, I can say that Emilia Müller was polite and respectful during our conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation with Emilia Müller. The conversation was professional and respectful on both sides.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not feel being discriminated or offended. As mentioned earlier, the conversation was professional and respectful. Emilia Müller expressed her budget constraints and I stated my willingness to negotiate, but we were unable to reach an agreement on price.
name: Peter Schmidt
